TopicTitle: How to Calculate Motion on Kerbal Space Program

Articles.Content:
I just uploaded a video for those who want to calculate motion from a rocket launched up in space. Let me know what you guys thinks of it so far ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif).

Here is the link

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RmN6saXGoqU](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RmN6saXGoqU)

I plan to do more parts pretty soon since I already have the second velocity function already done. All these are done manually by hand and video. I didnt cheat or used any of the mods one bit.

Anyway enjoy

This is what I see when clicking the link:

"This video has been removed by the user"
